improvements: Increase overall exposure by roughly +0.70 EV to fix underexposure
Boost the Whites slider by +25 and Highlights by +10 to make the fur brilliant white
Increase Vibrance by +15 to enhance the green grass and pink tongue
Crop the top 15% of the frame to reduce excessive headroom and balance the composition
critiques.notes: The image features a charming subject and excellent depth of field, but the flat, overcast lighting renders the white fur gray. Brightening the exposure and tightening the crop will restore the subject's brilliance and create a more professional impact.

improvements: Increase sharpness by 15-20% and apply selective focus sharpening to the dog's face and eyes to enhance subject clarity
Boost contrast by 10-15% and slightly increase shadows to add depth to the flat overcast lighting
Warm up white balance by 200-300K to counteract the cool, gray tone and add warmth to the white fur
Apply a subtle vignette (15-20% opacity) to draw more attention to the dog and reduce distraction from the background elements
critiques.notes: The composition effectively uses leading lines from the railroad tracks and places the subject well in the foreground. However, the overcast conditions create flat, low-contrast lighting that reduces visual impact. The image suffers from slight softness and a cool color cast that makes the scene feel dull. These targeted adjustments would enhance the dog's presence and create more visual interest.
